verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
He took my sins away,
He took my sins away,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And keeps me singing every day!
I'm so glad He took my sins away.
He took my sins away.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
And now His love has made
My heart so glad.
He took my sins away.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
He took them all away.
And now on Him I roll
My every care.
He took my sins away.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
No condemnation have I in my heart.
He took my sins away;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He took my sins away.
His perfect peace He did to me impart.
He took my sins away.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
If You will come to Jesus Christ today,
He'll take Your sins away,
He'll take Your sins away,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And keep You happy in His love each day.
He'll take Your sins away.
